page.title: 18PUBS IN THE SEISDON AREA
page.content: Four public houses are contained in this block. All are popular with people from outside the area who come by car from Wolverhampton, Dudley and other places in the nearby Black Country as well as from further afield. Local people patronize them too but their custom alone would not be sufficient. All the public houses serve light bar meals and one has a popular restaurant too. One landlord commented that this was a very nice area to live and work in and that, although not rich, he made a reasonable living and enjoyed the variety of his customers. A thriving restaurant situated on the main road is chiefly frequented by people driving out from nearby urban areas.
